dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.spec.rfs.ResourceFacingServiceSpecComposite
dataStructure.description:
This is an abstract base class that defines an integrated set of ResourceFacingServices that collectively meets the needs of a CustomerFacingService. For example, the Customer may have requested "GoldService", which is a ServicePackage that defines a set of ServiceBundles, each of which has its own QoS. Each individual ResourceFacingService that is part of the ServicePackage can be derived from a ResourceFacingServiceSpecification. In this case, a ResourceFacingServiceSpecComposite will aggregate all of the individual ResourceFacingServiceSpecifications into a single named object. This object is a stand-alone object. However, it consists of other ResourceFacingServiceSpecComposite and/or ResourceFacingServiceSpecAtomic entities. That is the primary difference between this entity and the ResourceFacingServiceSpecAtomic entity. Please see the DEN-ng Service Model whitepaper for more information and examples.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ResourceFacingServiceSpecComposite

child.name: resourceFacingServiceSpec
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association HasResourceFacingServiceSpecs

This association end is optional
child.label: resourceFacingServiceSpec
